pullRequest.title: Simplify: Combine if statements
pullRequest.bodyText:
Resolves various Codacy violations
Please double check for any 'or' conditions in particular and that if blocks are combined correctly
PR is broken up into multiple to avoid review overload
Please review without whitespace changes, only changes to if statement blocks

https://github.com/triplea-game/triplea/pull/6573/files?w=1

nodes.bodyText:
Just a thought:
sections.getOrDefault(player.getName(), List.of()).contains(key.get(1))
would be a shorter variant of the if statement, I haven't convinced myself that it's clearly better though
This put operation is redundant btw if I'm not missing something obvious
